Parliament of Harlon

The Parliament of Harlon is a bicameral Parliament consisting of the House of Assembly, the lower house, and the Senate, the upper house. The Parliament writes, debates and votes on proposed legislation.

The Speaker
The Speaker of the Parliament of the Federation of Harlon is the presiding officer of the House of Assembly, the lower house of the Parliament of Harlon.
east
House of Assembly (Lower House)
The House of Assembly is the lower house in the Harlonian Parliament.
east
Senate (Upper House)
The Senate is the upper house in the Harlonian Parliament.
east
